text: Klaus Schulze (4 August 1947 – 26 April 2022) was a German electronic music musician and composer. He also used the alias Richard Wahnfried and was a member of the Krautrock bands Tangerine Dream, Ash Ra Tempel, and The Cosmic Jokers. Schulze was born in Berlin, Germany. Schulze died on 26 April 2022 from a long-illness, aged 74.Electronic music legend Klaus Schulze passes away 1947 – 2022 ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2022 deaths Category:20th-century German composers Category:Electronic musicians Category:Musicians from Berlin Category:21st-century German composers
title: Klaus Schulze
